overview.title: JetCredit Overview
overview.description: JetCredit is a specialized module for integration with PostBank, which allows your customers to shop on credit directly through your Shopify store.
overview.description_extended: The module automatically calculates monthly installments, applies individual interest rates, and ensures seamless transfer of orders to the bank's system.

features.title: Key Features
features.terms_support: Support for different repayment terms (3-36 months)

module_status.label: Module Status
module_status.description: Enable or disable the JetCredit module

card_button.label: Show button for sending via credit card
card_button.placeholder: Show button for sending via credit card
card_button.description: Display button for purchasing credit through PBF Personal Finance with the loan application made via credit card

email.label: Choose email to send requests
email.description: Choose email address to send requests to. Use 'online.shop@pbpf.bg' to send requests to PBF Personal Finance. You can enter multiple email addresses separated by a comma. (If left blank, the default email for the system will be used. It is recommended to use an email outside your domain to avoid auto-span protection.)
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

shop_id.label: Choose store identifier for sending
shop_id.description: Choose store identifier to send to the Bank together with the loan application. The Bank will recognize your requests with this identifier

interest_rate.label: Choose interest rate
interest_rate.description: Choose interest rate for the loan application

default_installments.label: Choose default number of installments
default_installments.description: Choose default number of installments on the module page

card_interest_rate.label: Interest rate for credit card
card_interest_rate.description: Choose interest rate for the loan application made via credit card

order_count.label: Order number
order_count.description: Order number for the current loan application

min_price.label: Minimum Amount
min_price.description: Minimum amount for which the filter can be activated
min_price.invalid: Minimum amount must be a positive integer

currency_display.label: Choose currency display mode
currency_display.description: Choose currency display mode for the system

currency.leva_only: Single display in BGN, send requests in BGN
currency.leva_euro_dual: Dual display BGN/EUR, send requests in BGN
currency.euro_leva_dual: Dual display EUR/BGN, send requests in EUR
currency.euro_only: Single display in EUR, send requests in EUR

table.product_id_description: Product identifier in Shopify system. Id #. The filter applies to all products if you use the global symbol *
table.interest_rate_description: Select markup percentage for this filter. If 'Do not show button' is selected, button won't appear on product page
table.installments_description: Months this filter applies to. Use underscore as separator
table.min_price_description: Product price above which this filter activates. 0 = applies to all prices
table.start_date_description: Date when this filter starts working
table.end_date_description: Date when this filter stops working

actions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this filter?

product_id.label: Product ID number
product_id.description: The identifier of a product in the Shopify system. Id #. The filter applies to all products if you use the global symbol *
product_id.placeholder: Enter product ID or '*' for all products

interest_rate.label: Choose interest rate
interest_rate.description: Choose interest rate for the filter. If you select 'Do not show button', the button will not appear on the product page

installments.label: For which monthly installments does the filter apply

min_price.label: Product price above which this filter activates
min_price.description: If you leave 0, the filter will apply to all prices

start_date.label: Start of filter action
start_date.description: Date from which the filter starts working

end_date.label: End of filter action
end_date.description: Date until which the filter is active
